plot: Seiya and the rest of the Bronze and Gold Saints who have survived the Sanctuary battle have entered the world of the Dead. They are fighting to get to Hades and defeat him.
opening_theme: " Megami no Senshi...Pegasus Forever" by Marina Del Ray
